participant_1.background:
My family members all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
i was adopted when i was a baby.
I love my cats and badminton.
My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
My stamp collection was stolen when my house was broken into.

participant_2.background:
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
i like to read books.
i give out sports information.
i have a sweet tooth.
I went to Japan once, and it was amazing!

content.text: Hello, I hope you are having a good day.
Hello there! I am moving to a new city soon to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
Wow, that sounds exciting! I hope you enjoy your new home.
Thank you! I am looking forward to it. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, play badminton, and cook. I also have a sweet tooth.
I love reading too! I am currently reading a book about Japan. I went there once and it was amazing!
That sounds like a great book! I would love to read it sometime. I have never been to Japan, but it sounds like a beautiful place.
It is! I hope you get to visit one day.
What kind of food do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
I love Italian food too! I am a big fan of pasta and pizza.
Me too! I love making pasta and pizza.
I love to eat pasta and pizza!
We should have a pasta and pizza party sometime!
That would be fun! We could make homemade pizza and pasta.
That sounds great! I will bring the pasta and you can bring the pizza.
Perfect! I am looking forward to it.
